question: Is there any paper that studies a teacher AI inferring mental states of a student role in a role-playing game setup using reinforcement learning?
answer_format: Your answer should be the title of the paper WITHOUT ANY EXPLANATION.

eval_kwargs.question: Is there any paper that studies a teacher AI inferring mental states of a student role in a role-playing game setup using reinforcement learning?
eval_kwargs.reference_answer: I Cast Detect Thoughts: Learning to Converse and Guide with Intents and Theory-of-Mind in Dungeons and Dragons
